name: Foobar2000 Theme
summary: Learn about .FTH files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Foobar2000 is an extensible freeware audio player. It can play many types of audio files and includes several other features, including the ability to create and import custom themes.

Each Foobar2000 theme, or FTH file, includes settings that specify the app's background, text, selection, and highlight colors, its font(s), and its main, status bar, and toolbar layout. When exporting a theme as an FTH file, users can choose to include some or all of these custom settings in the file.
In the Preferences window, select Display → Default User Interface.
If needed, modify your Foobar2000 theme using the associated settings in the Default User Interface section.
When the Choose Theme Sections to Export window appears, choose the elements you want to export as an FTH file. Then, click OK to finish naming and saving your FTH file.

description: An FTH file is a theme used by Foobar2000, an audio player for Windows. It contains settings that specify Foobar 2000's colors, fonts, and layouts. Users create and import FTH files in Foobar2000's Preferences → Display → Default User Interface menu.

instructions: You can open an FTH file with Foobar2000 (Windows). To import an FTH file:
In the Preferences window, select Display → Default User Interface.
When the Choose Theme Sections to Import window appears, choose the elements you want to import. Then, click OK to apply those elements.
